channel.title: Konsole hangs when installing software
channel.description:
Hello,
The terminal (Konsole) hangs when I want to install additional software. [code] user@host:~$ kdesudo apt-get install xterm Reading package lists... Building dependency tree... Reading state information... The following extra packages will be installed: xbitmaps Suggested packages: xfonts-cyrillic The following NEW packages will be installed: xbitmaps xterm 0 upgraded, 2 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded. Need to get 642 kB of archives. After this operation, 1,879 kB of additional disk space will be used. [/code]
The question " Do you want to continue? [Y/n]" is not showing and the terminal seems to hang.
I tried to force the installation with "apt-get -y" but this option is not recognized. [code] user@host:~$ kdesudo apt-get -y install xterm kdesudo: Unknown option 'y'. kdesudo: Use --help to get a list of available command line options. user@host:~$ [/code]
Actually I wanted to replace the KDE-desktop with LXDE because KDE consumes to much system-resources. Tor-browser hangs when I have more then three tabs open and the system is responding slow on this computer. Also the always 'jumping icons' beneath the mouse-pointer I do not like in KDE. So I tried to install LXDE and there the problem with the hanging terminal started. First I thought that de Konsole causes the hang, so I tried to install the lighter xterm as terminal.
How can I resolve the problem with the hanging terminal (Konsole) when installing software?
Any help is much appreciated. If you need more information, please let me know.
Thanx in advance, xud

item.title: Konsole hangs when installing software
item.dc:creator: xud
item.description:
Thanks everyone! Problem is solved.

During gateway-boot I used the option to CNTRL + D and started the gateway without the GUI. And I used sudo instead of kdesudo for installing software.
Problem solved!
Thanks for your help, and thanks Patrick for the link about other DE 's.

Keep up the good work!

item.title: Konsole hangs when installing software
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Don’t use kdesudo for cli tools. Use kdesudo for graphical tools only. Otherwise just sudo. Follow the instructions for updating.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Update
